body_html: I'm updating all the Docker images, but the gcr.io ones won't be updated until after 1.0. In the meantime, you can start from nvidia/cuda:8.0-cudnn5-devel-ubuntu16.04 and just add RUN pip install tensorflow_gpu
body_text: I'm updating all the Docker images, but the gcr.io ones won't be updated until after 1.0. In the meantime, you can start from nvidia/cuda:8.0-cudnn5-devel-ubuntu16.04 and just add RUN pip install tensorflow_gpu
body: I'm updating all the Docker images, but the gcr.io ones won't be updated until after 1.0. In the meantime, you can start from nvidia/cuda:8.0-cudnn5-devel-ubuntu16.04 and just add `RUN pip install tensorflow_gpu`
